name: Blockman & You
description:
Blockman & You is a game about remembering and exploring Blockman's life and lived experiences through items personal to them. It is a game without an objective, and focuses solely on narrative exploration. When you feel satisfied interacting with the items, there is but one way to end the game: leave through the same door you came in.

Credits:

- Game Developed by Jared Vitchkoski

- Environment models created by Jared Vitchkoski

- Low Poly Nature Pack by Elcanetay
